Title: Relates to providing an exemption from the supplemental metropolitan commuter transportation district registration fee for historical motor vehicles
Summary: Provides an exemption from the supplemental metropolitan commuter transportation district registration fee for historical motor vehicles.
LawCode: Amd ยง499-b, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to providing a metropolitan commuter transportation district registration fee exemption for historical motor vehicles
